# ColumnSelection.numeric

**Case**

Select all numeric columns in the data frame.

## Declaration

```swift
case numeric
```

## Discussion

Numeric columns are columns with elements of type `Int`, `UInt8`, `Float`, `Double`. Also arrays of those types and shaped arrays of those types.

## Column selection types

- **ColumnSelection.all**: Select all columns in the data frame.
- **ColumnSelection.exclude(columnNames:)**: Selects all columns except the specified columns.
- **ColumnSelection.include(columnNames:)**: Selects only the specified columns.
